Welcome Ges!

When you say level cap mid 20s, is that 25 or is it something else?

posts.author: ges02
posts.content: ps is concentration needed at all for spellcasting? Also, what if I went with medium armor breastplate or chain mail

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Concentration serves two purposes that I can think of atm. For spellcasters it protects your spellcasting from being disrupted when someone damages you. It also helps defend against taunting attempts.
I have not put anything in concentration here, so you risk being disrupted if you cast spells in the heat of battle. The reason why I have ignored it is that this character is a fairly strong mele- fighter even without the spells and will most often buff up before battle with the most important spells. If you are caught unaware, or dispelled, your songs will be your best quick-buffs, and they will not be interrupted.
But, by all means, it is not wrong to build up concentration, but here I have given other skills priority.

Breastplate and chainmail give less AC than full plate. Full plate gives 8 + 1 from dexterity if dex is 12 or better. Breastpalte and chainmail give maximum 5 + 2 from dexterity if your dex is 14 or better. Medium armor has slightly less arcane spell failure than heavy armor, but still high enough to make your spellcasting unreliable if you drop still spell. Unless there is a specific "uber" medium armor that you want to make a build for, I recommend full plate for strength based bards.
